effect.en: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.
effect.fr: Si le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est un Pokémon Évolutif, cette attaque inflige 60 dégâts supplémentaires.
effect.es: Si el Pokémon Activo de tu rival es un Pokémon Evolución, este ataque hace 60 puntos de daño más.
effect.it: Se il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario è un Pokémon Evoluzione, questo attacco infligge 60 danni in più.
effect.pt: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.
effect.de: Wenn das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ein Entwicklungs-Pokémon ist, fügt diese Attacke 60 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.

effect.en: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.
effect.es: Este Pokémon también se hace 50 puntos de daño a sí mismo.
effect.it: Questo Pokémon infligge anche 50 danni a se stesso.
effect.pt: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.
effect.de: Dieses Pokémon fügt auch sich selbst 50 Schadenspunkte zu.

description.en: Because this Pokémon is hotheaded and belligerent, it's Corviknight that's taken the role of transportation in Galar.
